attributes.action: Remove the Hahn/Cock from Trafalgar Square
attributes.additional_details:
I think that the Hahn/Cock in Trafalgar Square is extremely disrespectful to all of our heroes who fought to defend Britain from Napoleon's Empire.
The Hahn/Cock should be removed as it devalues the meaning of Trafalgar Square and what our soldiers fought for.

rejection.details: For the Mayor's office to decide.
